title: Kozo Yuki
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
Kozo began his career with <a href="Yokohama%20Fl%C3%BCgels">Yokohama Flügels</a> and played later for the <a href="Waseda%20University">Waseda University</a>. In 2002, he left <a href="Waseda%20University">Waseda University</a>. He was now scouted by <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> club <a href="JEF%20United%20Chiba">JEF United Ichihara</a> (later "JEF United Chiba"). He debuted in 2003 and played many matches as center back from 2004. JEF United won the champions in <a href="2005%20J.League%20Cup">2005</a> and <a href="2006%20J.League%20Cup">2006 J.League Cup</a>. However he could hardly play in the match from 2007. After seven years for JEF United, he moved to <a href="J2%20League">J2 League</a> club <a href="Sanfrecce%20Hiroshima">Sanfrecce Hiroshima</a> in June 2008. He played many matches as substitute defender and Sanfrecce won the champions in <a href="2008%20J.League%20Division%202">2008 J2 League</a>. However he resigned end of 2008 season. After half-year blank, On 20 July 2009, the <a href="2.%20Bundesliga">2. Bundesliga</a> club <a href="Fortuna%20D%C3%BCsseldorf">Fortuna Düsseldorf</a> signed the Japanese Defender until the end of the year.
